2070900.name: Hush Hush - Official Artbook
2070900.description:
This Artbook PDF contains all the behind-the-scenes concept art, backgrounds, character pin-ups and poses from Hush Hush including unused artwork as well! Enjoy these beautiful hi-res illustrations and remember to play the game first because there are spoilers in some of these illustrations. This artbook has 195 pages and looks stunning!
Once it's installed, right-click 'Hush Hush' in your Library and select Manage > Browse local files. It's a PDF in that folder named HushHushArtbook. (We'll improve this process in the future!)
2070900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
